title: drag and drop mit firefox 18.0.2 not possible
body:
copying files with drag and drop is not possible. i'm using ff 18.0.2 on windows xp sp3 32bit. i'm using owncloud 4.5.6 on sles 11 sp2 64bit.
it does not matter if i copy the files in the upper level or in a directory. it seems that the files are uploaded (moving icons), but changing the view e.g. to music and then changing back, the files are vanished.

this is the error_log from apache:

[wed feb 20 14:11:39 2013] [error] [client 146.107.135.80] php warning:  invalid argument supplied for foreach() in /srv/www/owncloud/apps/files/ajax/upload.
php on line 40, referer: http://vm59093-1.helmholtz-muenchen.de/?app=files

bernd
